pages.text: If you lose your life while adventuring, you will very likely lose any and all $(2)Experience$() you were carrying. What a shame.$(p)Those days are over, thanks to new innovations in handling your precious levels.

pages.title: Liquid Experience
pages.text: $(2)Liquid Experience$() is the raw essence of levels. This may be singlehandedly one of the most useful liquids you can get in the game, due to the versatility of it.$(p)But first, there is the matter of $(9)acquiring it.$()
The $(2)Experience Hopper$() will pick up XP Balls in an area in front of it, and deposit it into a tank behind it automatically.
The $(2)Experience Siphon$() will remove Levels from any Player which steps on it, convert, and place Liquid Experience into a tank below it.
The $(2)Experience Mill$() is what you can use all of this Liquid Experience at as a very versatile block. It does not require power to function.

The options for this block are as follows:$(li)Enchantment Mode, which will apply a random enchantment to a tool or item,$(li)Anvil Mode, which can combine items to fill durability or combine enchantments,$(li)Book Mode, which will take a catalyst item and normal book and craft an Enchanted Book as a result!$(br)There is also a unique upgrade required to boost the power of the machine.

pages.title: Exp. Mill Level Upgrade
pages.text: This will boost the resulting enchantments in Enchantment Mode in the Experience Mill, as well as the max level resulting from Book Mode.
